Home > Worthopedia–Price Guide > McDONALDS RESTAURANT, SIGN&RONALD McDONALD -RARE Terms and Conditions for using our site
McDONALDS RESTAURANT, SIGN&RONALD McDONALD -RARE 4 Sold For: or Sign In to see what it's worth. Sold Date: 02/04/2007 Channel: Online Auction Source: eBay
I am selling my Department 56 Snow Village Collection. Up for bids over the next couple of weeks will be homes, town buildings, cars and accessosries. T will be no single items, all will be in groups of two or more. Included in this group: RARE and HARD TO FIND! McDonalds Hamburgers (bottom has date of 1997), McDonald's "Light Up The Night" sign, and Kids, Candy Canes and Ronald McDonald. All items are in original boxes and excellent condition. The boxes all have the McDonald's logo on them. This is a great group and a must for the Snow Village collector! All pieces have bright vivid coloring, no chips or cracks. T is NO RESERVE, all items start with a $1.00 bid. If you have questions please email me, I will respond to all emails. Items will be packaged with bubble packing and shipped Priority Mail. Postage will be $10.00, insurance additional. All checks must clear before items will be shipped. Payment is expected with 7 days of auction. THANK YOU for looking and be sure to check oout my other Department 56 itmes.
